name: Close to Open
description:
Claustrophobia is the obsessive and irrational fear of closed places,  which generates strong anxiety and discomfort. For a patient who  suffers from it, a course of therapy is necessary, so  the symptoms can  decrease until they disappear. Close to Open is a first-person simulation in which the user is placed in  front of different scenarios, increasingly cramped, with which he will have to interact. 

The project has been realized within the Virtual Reality course provided by the Politecnico di Torino.
